mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (member_id, password, name, first_name, last_name, phone_number, birthday, address, email, gender) VALUES (#{memberId},#{password}, #{name}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{phoneNumber}, #{birthday}, #{address},#{email}, #{gender})
mapper.select: SELECT member_id "memberId", password "password", name "name", first_name "firstName", last_name "lastName", phone_number "phoneNumber", birthday "birthday", address "address", email "email", gender "gender", is_admin "isAdmin", is_deleted "isDeleted" FROM MEMBER WHERE member_id = #{memberId}

mapper.select: SELECT t.member_id AS "memberId", t.name AS "name", t.reservation_id AS "reservationId", a.airline_name AS "airlineName", s.department_nation AS "departmentNation", s.department_date AS "departmentDate", s.department_time AS "departmentTime", s.arrival_nation AS "arrivalNation", s.arrival_date AS "arrivalDate", s.arrival_time AS "arrivalTime", t.phone_number AS "phoneNumber", t.seat_type AS "seatType", t.ticket_type AS "ticketType", t.reservation_status AS "reservationStatus", t.total_price AS "totalPrice" FROM TICKET t INNER JOIN SCHEDULE s ON t.schedule_id = s.schedule_id INNER JOIN AIRLINE a ON s.airline_id = a.airline_id WHERE t.member_id = #{memberId} AND t.reservation_status = '예약 완료'
